title: Simu Liu to Make Broadway Debut in ‘Oh, Mary!’
summary: The Marvel star will play the role of Mary's Teacher in Cole Escola's hit comedy.

title: Nick Reiner “Wanted to Be a Successful Writer” and Felt Pressure to Live Up to Family, Says Podcast Host
summary: Reiner made four appearances on David Manheim's podcast 'Dopey,' but the host says that Reiner cut off communication after he asked for help in landing father Rob Reiner as a guest: "It pushed him away."
